name: Compulsive Liar
requirements: You cannot have the Scouts Honor Quirk
description: You add a d4 to all Deception Checks, but subtract d4 from all Persuasion Checks.

name: Scout's Honor
requirements: You cannot have the Compulsive Liar Quirk
description: You add a d4 to all Persuasion Checks, but subtract a d4 from all Deception Checks.

name: Pussy Cat
description: You add d4 to Mental Saves and Checks against Rodents, but you subtract d4 from Mental Saves and Checks against Canines.

name: Four Eyes
description: While wearing glasses, you add a d4 to checks tha require sight, but without glasses you instead subtract a d4.

name: Small Frame
description: You add a d4 to Acrobatics Checks, but subtract a d4 from Athletics Checks.

name: Very Friendly
description: You add a d4 to all Charisma Checks, but subtract a d4 from all Attack Checks.

name: Hoarder
description: You gain 3 more Inventory Slots, but when all of your Inventory Slots are not filled, you subtract a d4 to Mental Saves.

name: Man's Man
description: You add a d4 to Charisma Checks against men, but you subtract a d4 on Charisma Checks against women.

name: Lady Lover
description: You add a d4 to Charisma Checks against women, but you subtract a d4 on Charisma Checks against men.

name: Militant Sympathizer
description: You are a known associate with the either the Marquise de Cat or Eyrie Dynasty Faction. You add a d4 to Persuasion Checks made against your members of your chosen, but subtract a d4 from Persusion Checks with those that oppose your chosen faction. The DM may roll the subtraction if the the players are unaware of an NPC's alligenace.

name: Bottomless Stomach
description: You add a d4 to Saves against ingested poisons or spoiled food. You subtract a d4 from Social Checks when food is present, as you are easily distracted by it.

name: Armchair General
description: You add a d4 to History Checks about combat or warfare, but you subtract d4 from Survival Checks to navigate terrain or forage, as your knowledge is purely theoretical.

name: Bleeding Heart
description: You add a d4 to Insight checks to detect suffering, fear, or sadness in another creature. You subtract a d4 from Intimidation checks, as you struggle to convincingly project cruelty.

name: People Watcher
description: You add a d4 to Insight checks made to understand strangers or crowds. You subtract a d4 from Perception checks to notice environmental details, as you are focused on the people.

name: Gruff Exterior
description: You add a d4 to Intimidation checks. Your blunt manner subtracts a d4 from Persuasion checks when trying to be charming, diplomatic, or delicate.

name: Bird's-Eye View
description: You add a d4 to sight-based Checks made from an elevated perch or while flying, but you subtract a d4 from sight-based Checks made to notice details at ground level or underfoot.

name: Terrier Tenacity
description: You add a d4 to Athletics checks made to dig, burrow, or squeeze into tight spaces. Your short legs and low profile cause you to subtract a d4 from checks made to reach high objects or keep pace over long-distance travel.

name: Alley Cat
description: You add a d4 to Stealth checks made in urban environments, crowded markets, or at night. Your disdain for authority and messy situations causes you to subtract a d4 from group Performance or Persuasion checks where decorum is expected.

name: Retriever's Joy
description: You add a d4 to Athletics checks made to swim or to fetch/retrieve a specific thrown object. Your friendly, trusting nature causes you to subtract a d4 on Insight checks to detect lies from anyone who shows you kindness.

name: Feather Plucker
description: You add a d4 to Intimidation checks made against Birds and Rodents. Your predatory swagger causes you to subtract a d4 from Deception checks when trying to appear harmless or non-threatening to them.

name: Cheese Fiend
description: You add a d4 to any check made to locate, identify, or acquire food, especially dairy. The mere presence of a known, unsecured food source within sight causes you to subtract a d4 from Perception checks.

name: Songbird
description: You add a d4 to Performance checks made by singing or whistling. Your beautiful song makes you highly noticeable; you subtract a d4 from Stealth Checks.
